@r-0987: You are here long time and yet you haven't read or you don't know:

*** 2-pass encoding for PC, PS3 or Xbox . ***
*** Video is H264; audio is AAC LC and container is MP4. ***

However, new DVD players and standalone media players have MP4 abilities. RTFM.
